p: A 3D volume reconstruction for day 5 sample for both lipids and proteins was performed, acquiring a z stack (number of frames = 13, step = 1 Î¼m) of SRS images at 2,845 cm -1 and at 2,940 cm -1, respectively ( Fig 4A and 4B). The 3D composite image in Fig 4C was achieved by merging the two previous SRS images, where proteins are displayed in red and lipids in green.
